name: Lords of Discord
blurb: Lords of Discord is a turn-based strategy game set in a fictional fantasy world in which players control armies of mythical creatures.

rewards.reward:
Scout
______________________________
Special thanks e-card, newsletter subscription.
Hi-res downloadable wallpaper pack.
Warrior\r\n______________________________\r\nGet a  DRM-free digital copy of the game for your preferred platform  (iOS, Android, Mac, PC, Linux) + PREVIOUS REWARD.
Weapon-master\r\n______________________________\r\nKICKSTARTER SPECIAL. Get a DRM-free digital copy of the game for all platforms (iOS, Android, Mac, PC, Linux) + ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS.

Weapon-master ______________________________ KICKSTARTER SPECIAL. Get a DRM-free digital copy of the game for all platforms (iOS, Android, Mac, PC, Linux).Digital soundtrack \u2013 mp3/Flac. + ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS.

Berserker
______________________________
Beta access to play the game before your friends.
+1 game copy gift to a friend for all platforms (iOS, Android, Mac, PC, Linux). Digital guidebook + ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS.

Berserker ______________________________ Beta access to play the game before your friends. +1 game copy gift to a friend for all platforms (iOS, Android, Mac, PC, Linux). Digital soundtrack \u2013 mp3/Flac. Digital guidebook + ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS.

Mage
______________________________
High quality digital artbook  (pdf / 30 pages / printable edition / 170 DPI ).
Digital soundtrack – mp3/Flac.
Your name in “Special Thanks” credits in-game + ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS.

Ranger
______________________________
+3 game copies (for all platforms) to share with friends.

Exclusive artefact in campaign and multiplayer.
The ring of four citadels - made from tiny pieces of four citadels' spires, unremarkable at first glance, but gives inexplicable resistance to magic of the four elements.

Digital illustrated storybook  (pdf / 30 pages / printable edition / 170 DPI) + ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS.

Chameleon
______________________________
Alternative unit skins to play in campaign and multiplayer.

Printed guidebook  (pdf / 30 pages / printable edition / 170 DPI).

Your photo, printed and hung on the office wall for a year to watch over us, plus we will use it in our “After Kickstarter” video + ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS.

Poster Child
______________________________
Digital poster with you drawn (based on your photo) as the mighty game hero of your choice.(360 DPI).

High-Quality printed Artbook 
(30 pages /  360 DPI / 5″x7″) + ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS.

Custom Poster Child\r\n______________________________\r\nA printed poster with you drawn as the mighty hero of your choice + your armour will be customized according to your description (720 DPI / 16\u201d x 23\u201d). + ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS.
Collector\r\n______________________________\r\nPegasus Knight figure cast in metal and set on an amber base (iron/3-4 inches in height) + ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS.
Custom NPC\r\n______________________________\r\nA non-playable character in the neutral forces pool designed according to your description will be included in the game + ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS.

Hero\r\n______________________________\r\nOne of the main hero characters of your choice will be designed according to your description, to play in campaign/multiplayer battles exclusively by you to show you as one of the most generous backers + ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS.

God\r\n______________________________\r\nCo-producer of the game, you will be able to write a part of the story line in campaign mode, design a map and your statue will be placed in a Citadel of your choice + ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS.
